body.description: The IMUSA Electric Espresso Maker, designed for coffee on-the-go, allows you to enjoy your favorite caffeinated drink in minutes! The espresso tradition meets modern technology and convenience and is easy to use. Just fill the lower tank with water, place ground coffee in the funnel, and place the carafe on the electrical base. Press the easy one-touch on button and the espresso maker will do the rest.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Make Espresso at Home The IMUSA Electric Espresso Maker is your perfect companion for on-the-go coffee enjoyment, ensuring you can savor your favorite caffeinated beverage in a matter of minutes! This espresso maker seamlessly blends traditional espresso craftsmanship with modern technology and convenience, providing a user-friendly experience. Using it is a breeze – simply fill the lower tank with water, add ground coffee to the funnel, place the carafe on the electrical base, and press the easy one-touch button. With these simple steps, the espresso maker takes care of the rest, delivering a quick and hassle-free brewing process.

Easy to Use This electric espresso maker boasts a transparent pitcher, allowing users to visually track the entire brewing process and enjoy the spectacle. The on/off switch, complemented by an indicator light, simplifies machine control, providing a clear status update during operation. With a brewing time of less than 10 minutes, this appliance ensures a quick and efficient coffee-making experience right in the comfort of your home. Its practical design includes features like a cool-touch side handle and an easy-pour spout for added convenience. This espresso maker is an ideal companion for those who seek a blend of functionality and user-friendly design in their daily coffee routine.

About IMUSA IMUSA is one of the leading Ethnic houseware brand with deep roots in Latin America and the United States that offers hundreds of houseware products including gadgets, cookware, appliances, espresso, and ethnic specialty items. IMUSA quality has been tested and handed down by homemakers who have been cooking for their families for more than 80 years! We invite you to learn about our line of products, try our recipes, and explore the exciting world of ethnic cuisines. Our mission is to bring our customers top quality products at a great value keeping in mind authenticity and tradition. Our constant pursuit of innovation has led us to develop many new products each year that make cooking fun and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had to have it!
reviews.reviewText: Love it that's its electric, easy to clean and makes excellent espresso

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for office use
reviews.reviewText: ===Smaller 1-2 cup review===Reviewing after my first try, will update as time goes on.From the reviews I was already expecting the plastic head part to not be great, but I'm Dominican so I just had a spare moka pot/greca around and replaced the head with a metal one. Couldn't find any review that mentioned changing the head so I was worried it wouldn't fit, but it fits perfectly and works just the same.I also read it brews too fast, but after 5-6 mins it came out pretty well, doesn't taste burnt to me.Another issue I read was that the metal separator that comes with it breaks easily. I just don't really use or need it. A pod good 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Electric Coffeemaker
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coffeemaker to use it after my surgery. It did not disappoint. Easy to assemble and to clean. Coffee is delicious

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the Espresso that Makes the difference
reviews.reviewText: This machine has done well. I was looking for a portable machine that I could take to and from work. Super portable and convenient! I do not like a lot of grounds in my cup, so you will want to pay attention to the grind on the espresso you choose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steal of a deal
reviews.reviewText: This product was delivered the very same day and works great. Produces enough coffee to keep the whole crew rocking at the jobsite!Very happy with this buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaks & Potential Fire Hazrd
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a DeLongi Alicia daily for over 5 years and when it started to leak, I replaced it with this unit. Since, my day starts at 3:30 am, I made my espresso the night before. SoOnce it got hot, it began to leak. I waited and ghe leaking stopped and it began to brew. Everything seemed fine and Iwent to bed, thinking it would have auto shut off. It does not shut off and by morning, it was burning. I guess I got what I paid and now it will be returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This machine only makes 3.5oz; not 3, 1.5oz cups (4.5oz total) they advertise.
reviews.reviewText: I like the convenience of using electric versus stovetop. It's quicker and easier.I don't like the misrepresentation of the cup size (I would have purchased the larger size.) Again, it makes 3.5ozs, not 4.5ozs. 1oz may not sound like much, but when you're only working with 3 or 4ozs, it is.I don't like the very poorly written instructions and the simple lack of some instructions.For example, they state to use a medium grind, it doesn't work. It needs to be a fine grind, otherwise the water just quickly rushes through the coffee and you get a very weak tasteless cup. You can't throttle the heat and therefore the rate of coffee flow like you can on a stove top. Because of this the grind needs to be finer to slow the water flow rate so it has time to extract the flavor.The water level differences they give you for making a 1 cup vs 3 cups makes no sense (a 1/4" lower water level as they state does not change the cups from 3 to 1cup. Always fill the tank to just below the pressure valve. Same with the coffee, fill it up every time; the "1 cup divider" the say to use will again give you a weak cup of tasteless coffee. One last thing, once the coffee starts to fill the upper chamber, remove it from the electric base. It has enough heat to continue pushing the remaining water up into the upper chamber. Leaving it on longer just overheats the lower boiler for no reason.Other than that I like the machine, and it made a fine cup of cuban style coffee. I just don't like companies that don't take the time needed to test run their instructions or make misrepresentations.I hope this helps you overcome the shortfalls of the instructions and gives you a great tasking cup of coffee. BTW, I use Starbucks "House blend" ground to an espresso fine grind.
Great little coffee machine the coffee always tastes great
